title: ðŸš¨ Jets fire Adam Gase following abysmal 2-14 season - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/3)
description:
It's that time of year where the siren becomes synonymousÂ with the Pick Six podcast feed. This one, while not shocking, is still for a head coach getting fired in the NFL. Adam Gase survived the regular season, but that's it, as the Jets announced soon after on Sunday that they are moving on from Gase after just two years. Will Brinson is joined by John Breech on this emergency episode to break down the decision and what's next for New York, both at coach and quarterback. Keep it locked to Pick Six for immediate reactions for all firings and hirings across the league.Â 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
